subject: AI & Agents
title: Reranking: Refining Search Results
description: One-minute skill: Reranking: Refining Search Results.

hook.text: Your search returns 100 results. A reranker picks the 5 that truly answer the question.

buildup.text: Rerankers score each (query, document) pair using a cross-encoder model.

discovery.text: Cross-encoders are more accurate than bi-encoders because they see query and doc together.

twist.text: Reranking is slow (O(n) forward passes), so only apply it to a shortlist from fast retrieval.

climax.text: Two-stage pipeline: fast retrieval (BM25 or vector) â†’ accurate reranking (cross-encoder).

punchline.text: Retrieve many. Rerank to the best.

quiz.question: Why is reranking only applied to a shortlist?
options: Cross-encoders are too slow to score all documents
